front.court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT MADRAS
front.case_number:
G.W.O.P.No.352 of 2020
and
A.Nos.1643 and 1644 of 2020
front.extra:
Prayer: Petition filed under Sections 3, 7-10 and Section 25 of the
Guardians and Wards Act, 1890 read with Order XXI Rules 2, 3 and 11
of O.S.Rules to appoint the petitioner as the Guardian of the person of
the minor child Aandrea George, born on 12.10.2010, now aged 9 years
and grant permanent custody of the person of the minor child, Aandrea
George, born on 12.10.2010 now aged 9 years to the petitioner.
